mapper.select: select count(*) from professor where professor_id=#{value}

insert into professor ( professor_id , professor_name , professor_email, professor_birthday , professor_phone , dept_id, professor_img , professor_password ) values ( #{professorId},#{professorName},#{professorEmail}, #{professorBirthday},#{professorPhone},#{deptId}, #{professorImg},#{professorPassword} )
